description: Only one unit of this model was brought in, making this a rare chance to drive a one-of-a-kind car. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Rare Rides: The allure of driving Volkswagen’s only 1.5-litre T-Cross in Singapore
title_page: Rare Rides: The allure of driving Volkswagen’s only 1.5-litre T-Cross in Singapore | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE –How does one put a price to the allure of driving a one-of-a-kind car in Singapore?
This question arises after a nine-month-old Volkswagen T-Cross with a 1.5-litre engine is put up for sale by Volkswagen Group Singapore’s (VGS) used-car arm Das WeltAuto.
